alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 25 at 1:34PM CDT until March 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Richland Creek Above Pulaski affecting Giles County. For the Richland Creek...including Pulaski...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Richland Creek Above Pulaski. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural land along the river begins * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.3 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 8.3 feet Thursday morning. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
